nl_types.h¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

IO

Description:

Defines I/O multiplexing functions related to message catalog operations.

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0

Description

nl_catd

Type of message catalog descriptor.

Description

catopen (const char *name, int oflag)

nl_catd

char *

Obtains information from a message catalog.
